text.__SUMMARY__: Quercus chungii is an uncommon species of tree in the beech family. It has been found only  in  southern China, in the Provinces of Guangxi, and Guizhou.Quercus chungii is a tree up to 15 meters tall with brown hairy twigs and leaves as much as 12 cm long.
text.External links: line drawing, Flora of China Illustrations vol. 4, figure 394, drawings 8-10 at lower right
